title: Return to Yesterday
description: PASSION WAS HER POWER, PERIL WAS ITS PRICEStacey Gordon had escaped the terrors of her odyssey through the Western wilderness. She was back safe in her husband's arms, surrounded by all the comforts of modern civilization.But Stacey could not forget what happened to her on the untamed frontier. She could not break free of the memory of the man who taught her the power of her own insatiable passions, as he brought her to the very peak of ecstasy And in one desperate gamble, Stacey abandoned all safety to once again be swept back through the vortex of time. It was the only way she could hope to quell the raging fire that still burned within her ... .
author: June Lund Shiplett
